# Perceive Cues (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 2]], [[2nd Level Inquisitor Spells|Inquisitor 2]], [[2nd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 2]], [[2nd Level Witch Spells|Witch 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 3]], [[BoXM 3rd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 3]], [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a drop of water)

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 235

Your senses become preternaturally keen, and you gain insight into subtle behavioral cues. For the duration of the spell, you receive a +5 competence bonus on [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] and [[Sense Motive (Skill)|Sense Motive]] checks.
